Vet app is online vet application. in Vet app your pet can be checkup via online or make an appointment for checkup. in vet app you also can buy medicine or some stuff that related to pets

certificate.subTittle: Study Sharing(STRING) is BEM FIK UPNVJ program for exam preparation. I become a mentor for Object-Oriented Programming or we know as OOP. I capably mentored over 25 Information System students, ascertaining their competency in implementing object-oriented programming (OOP) using the Java programming language. We learned about what is OOP, variable and data type. Also we disscus about Class, Pbject and Method and how we implements that thing in real porject. We also disscus about the different about Method Overriding and inheritance

Taking Course in Coursera called Meta Back-End Developer. One of the course is introduction to Back-End Development. In this course I learn about how internet works, how server works, how website works, what is HTML, CSS, and javascript. learn how to build basic website design, etc
Im taking this course for my Artificial Intelegent class in my college. in this course we learn about copy paste and how to use gpt hehe

Study Sharing(STRING) is BEM FIK UPNVJ program for exam preparation. I become a mentor for Object-Oriented Programming or we know as OOP. I capably mentored over 25 Information System students, ascertaining their competency in implementing object-oriented programming (OOP) using the Java programming language. We learned about what is OOP, variable and data type. Also we disscus about Class, Pbject and Method and how we implements that thing in real porject. We also disscus about the different about Method Overriding and inheritance
